name: TIE Reaper
ability: Adaptive Ailerons: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white 1 (left bank), 1 (straight) or 1 (right bank) maneuver.

pilots.name: Captain Feroph
pilots.caption: Imperial Courier
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the attacker does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your (eye)/blank results to an (evade) result.
